solution_line_template: Alex gives his friends a total of {num_friends} friends * {silk_per_friend} meters of silk = <<{num_friends}*{silk_per_friend}={silk_given_to_friends}>>{silk_given_to_friends} meters of silk.
This means he has {initial_silk_storage} - {silk_given_to_friends} = <<{initial_silk_storage}-{silk_given_to_friends}={silk_remaining}>>{silk_remaining} meters of silk left in storage.
He can therefore make {silk_remaining} meters of silk / {silk_per_dress} meters of silk per dress = <<{silk_remaining}/{silk_per_dress}={num_dresses}>>{num_dresses} dresses.
